title: It’s Time to Change the Cybersecurity Metaphors We Use
sub_head: Organizations might benefit by talking more about system “health” and less about the latest “attack” in their continuing “war” with hackers
body:
Pat Muoio is a general partner at SineWave Ventures, where she assesses emerging technologies and makes investment decisions.
There’s a lot to be learned from the words we use to describe things. Cybersecurity is a case in point.
